Package energy.model

Class Border

java.lang.Object
energy.model.Border
public class Border extends Object
The sides of a Tile.

    static Border

    static Border
    ofHexagon()
    Returns a new disconnected Border that can have at most 6 connected sides.
    static Border
    ofSquare()
    Returns a new disconnected Border that can have at most 4 connected sides.
    void
    rotate()
    Rotates the connected sides of this Border, counter-clockwise, of 90 degrees for squared Borders or 60 degrees for hexagonal Borders.

    • ofSquare

      public static Border ofSquare()
      Returns a new disconnected Border that can have at most 4 connected sides.
      Returns:
      a new disconnected Border that can have at most 4 connected sides

    • ofHexagon

      public static Border ofHexagon()
      Returns a new disconnected Border that can have at most 6 connected sides.

    • ofConnectedSquare

      public static Border ofConnectedSquare(int... indices)
      Returns a new squared Border with given connected sides.
      Parameters:
      indices - the array of connected side indices
      Returns:
      a new squared Border with given connected sides
      Throws:
      OversizedBorderException - if there more than 4 indices
      IllegalArgumentException - if the indices do not correspond to shape

    • ofConnectedHexagon

      public static Border ofConnectedHexagon(int... indices)
      Returns a new hexagonal Border with given connected sides.
      Parameters:
      indices - the array of connected side indices
      Returns:
      a new hexagonal Border with given connected sides
      Throws:
      OversizedBorderException - if there more than 6 indices
      IllegalArgumentException - if the indices do not correspond to shape

    • connect

      public Border connect(int side)
      Adds the given side to the connected sides of this Border. If the side is already connected, does nothing.
      Parameters:
      side - The new connected side.
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if side is not valid accordingly to this Border's sides shape.
      OversizedBorderException - if this Border reached its limit of connected sides.

    • connect

      public Border connect(int... sides)
      Connects the provided side indices. Indices can be connected twice.
      Parameters:
      sides - The sides to connect.
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if sides is not valid according to this Border's sides shape.
      OversizedBorderException - if this Border reached its limit of connected sides.

    • connect

      public Border connect(List<Integer> sides)
      Connects the provided side indices. Indices can be connected twice.
      Parameters:
      sides - The sides to connect.
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if sides is not valid according to this Border's sides shape.
      OversizedBorderException - if this Border reached its limit of connected sides.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(int side)
      Disconnects side.
      Parameters:
      side - The side to disconnect.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if side is not valid accordingly to this Border's sides shape.
      NotYetConnectedException - if side is not yet connected.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(int... sides)
      Disconnects the indices in the given array.
      Parameters:
      sides - The sides to disconnect.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if sides is not valid according to this Border's sides shape.
      NotYetConnectedException - if sides is not yet connected.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(List<Integer> sides)

      Parameters:
      sides - The sides to disconnect.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if sides is not valid according to this Border's sides shape.
      NotYetConnectedException - if sides is not yet connected.
